item.name: Get workflow data for a matrix
Create new nodes in the matrix
Update existing nodes in the matrix
Create new connections in the matrix
Update existing connections in the matrix

response.name: Matrix found

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.body:
{
  "id": "<integer>",
  "projectId": "<integer>",
  "name": "<string>",
  "status": "active",
  "version": "<integer>",
  "created": "<dateTime>",
  "updated": "<dateTime>",
  "description": "<string>",
  "config": {},
  "parentMatrixId": "<integer>",
  "nodes": [
    {
      "value": "reference #/components/schemas/Node not found in the OpenAPI spec"
    },
    {
      "value": "reference #/components/schemas/Node not found in the OpenAPI spec"
    }
  ],
  "connections": [
    {
      "sourceId": "<integer>",
      "targetId": "<integer>",
      "type": "default",
      "id": "<integer>",
      "matrixId": "<integer>",
      "config": {},
      "created": "<dateTime>",
      "updated": "<dateTime>"
    },
    {
      "sourceId": "<integer>",
      "targetId": "<integer>",
      "type": "success",
      "id": "<integer>",
      "matrixId": "<integer>",
      "config": {},
      "created": "<dateTime>",
      "updated": "<dateTime>"
    }
  ]
}
